mechanics.condition: Caster chooses up to three creatures within range
mechanics.outcome: Chosen creatures become targets of the spell

mechanics.condition: Creature is a target of Aid spell
mechanics.outcome: Target's hit point maximum increases by 5 for the spell's duration AND Target's current hit points increase by 5 for the spell's duration

description_text: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.
